articles.author: Andrea Kane
articles.title: Just how bad are ultraprocessed foods? Here are 5 things to know - CNN
articles.description: Ultraprocessed foods make up more than half of the typical American’s diet, and they’ve been linked to myriad health conditions. Here are five things to know.
articles.content:
When you open a bag of nacho-flavored chips or cheese puffs, you probably know that youre about to indulge in an unhealthy snack.
The dead giveaway? Its the yummy, spicy, cheesy, neon-orange dust th… [+7478 chars]
